plot: Jabbs sends his only suit to be pressed before a big date, but the tailor shop burns down. Pokes breaks into Jabbs' room but he's discovered and Jabbs takes his suit to wear on his date.
title: Pressing Business
plot_es: Jabbs sends his only suit to be pressed before a big date, but the tailor shop burns down. Pokes breaks into Jabbs' room but he's discovered and Jabbs takes his suit to wear on his date.
plot_en: Jabbs sends his only suit to be pressed before a big date, but the tailor shop burns down. Pokes breaks into Jabbs' room but he's discovered and Jabbs takes his suit to wear on his date.
